name: Muerna
description:
Escaping from a slaughterhouse, this lovely couple will overcome whatever it's in their way to get their freedom, joining forces and qualities. Will they find what they most want, surviving their way through the city? Or the real question is, does what they want even exists on the society we live in? And if does, what sacrifices need to be done to find the ultimate search for freedom?

A game by:
Dumitru "Dumivid" Dulgheru (programming & mapping)
Felipe "Fela" Llorca (music, art & SFX).

All game resources were done in a week for the Weekly Game Jam 109#.
(If you encounter an unexpected bug, use "R" button to restart the level).
